name: Elements (itch) (Ninepatch Games)
description:
Action roguelike where you can roll the dice for a chance at more powerful elemental upgrades.

How to play:

- WASD to move

- Numbers 1-4 to switch abilities

- Click to attack

Hints:

- Defeat all the enemies to progress. Before moving to the next level, collect your upgrade or roll the die for a chance at a better one.

- Upgrades are color-coded by elements 

- Upgrades only apply once you go through the door 

- If you get stuck on a level because of bad procgen, press N to skip to the next level
